channel.title: Sam Harden
channel.description: Lawyer / Fullstack Developer / Legal Technology Optimist.

item.title: The FJTC is Dead
item.description: Long Live the FJTC - On September 30 the Florida Justice Technology Center effectively shut down. I worked as a Project Manager then as Dev Team Leader for the FJTC for nearly two years. I left the FJTC in August to work with the legal research company vLex. A note about my work - Iâ€™m...
